description:
“Relax and enjoy a pleasant conversation with the stars” After the incident with Assemblyman Aikawa, more people start coming to see Vivy perform on stage. One day, Matsumoto appears before Vivy again, and urges her to get on board the Sunrise space hotel with him. While they travel to outer space, Vivy is conflicted by the gap between what she must do and her true mission.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: A Tender Moon Tempo -星たちとの歓談-
A Tender Moon Tempo: A Pleasant Chat with the Stars
A Tender Moon Tempo: Hoshi-tachi to Kandan
У темпі ніжного Місяця — приємна розмова із зірками
